oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Olive Oyl
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Zoo; parks; animals; food;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Olive Oyl, the Zoo's Simian Prima Donna, tops off each of her two daily meals with an ice cream cone (vanilla preferred) handed to her by Superintendent Melroy. She gets orange juice, bananas, apples, bread, milk and lettuce - all prepared with as much care as that given a baby's diet."
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Memphis & Shelby County Room Photograph Collection
